item.title: About
item.description: Hello world! This is usually how I start my websites. Anyway, let’s keep this quick and simple, my name is Gabriele Musco, as you can probably tell by the name of the website, and I’m a developer. I got my University degree in Computer Science on the 26th of July 2019, and I’m currently studying for my master’s degree. I am the developer of some free software applications for the Linux desktop, namely:
